contentList.content: Fighting Style: Dagger
Whenever you throw a dagger, you apply any poison it is coated with.
Fighting Style: Dagger
Whenever you throw a dagger, you apply any poison it is coated with.
Dagger Specialist

You apply bonuses from your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">attack</LSTag> when throwing a dagger. Additionally, a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON_MASTER">poisoned</LSTag> dagger applies the poison it is coated with.
You also gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for each dagger you are actively wielding.
Dagger Specialist

You apply bonuses from your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">attack</LSTag> when throwing a dagger. Additionally, a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON_MASTER">poisoned</LSTag> dagger applies the poison it is coated with.
You also gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for each dagger you are actively wielding.
Versatile

When wielding <LSTag Tooltip="Versatile">Versatile</LSTag> weapons you are <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">proficient</LSTag> with, you use your <LSTag Type="Ability" Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> modifier for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, or your <LSTag Type="Ability" Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> modifier, whichever is higher.
Additionally, you gain a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">weapon attack</LSTag> when wielding these weapons.

Throw a dagger with ruthless precision, dealing weapon damage + [1] and applying your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Attack</LSTag> effects. The thrown dagger also applies any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON_MASTER">Poison</LSTag> it is coated with.
You always use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> modifier when <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">throwing</LSTag> a dagger, if it is higher than your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.
The Blade Least Expected: Ki
Bouncing Knives
Throw a dagger with ruthless precision, applying your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Attack</LSTag> effects. The dagger bounce on [1] more targets, applying weapon effects and poisons.

Throw a dagger at your target, dealing weapon damage and applying your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Attack</LSTag> effects. The thrown dagger also applies any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON_MASTER">Poison</LSTag> it is coated with.
Throw Dagger

Throw a dagger at your target, dealing weapon damage and applying your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Attack</LSTag> effects. The thrown dagger also applies any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEAPON_COATED_WITH_POISON">Poison</LSTag> it is coated with.
You always use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> modifier when <LSTag Tooltip="Thrown">throwing</LSTag> a dagger, if it is higher than your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.
Throw Dagger
Fighting Style : Dagger (applier)
You can throw daggers. Use this if for some reason you've lost the condition (debug).
Master Poisoner : Apply

You can apply poison and oil freely.

Use this to apply the condition in case you lose it somehow.
Eldritch Bliss Aura
Evokes some implacably strong emotion within nearby creatures.
Eldritch Bliss Aura
Evokes some implacably strong emotion within nearby creatures.
Ephemeral
This item may disintegrate at any moment.
Shadow Blade
